    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

            <entry>cahi1:data_113837</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Swinging pendulum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwingpendel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pendule d'oscillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pêndulo balançando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pendolo d'oscillazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταλαντεμένος εκκρεμές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Péndulo que hace pivotar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that when a pendulum is pulled to one side and let go, it will swing back and forth.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amplitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">natural frequency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oscillations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pendulums</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">simple harmonic motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß, wenn ein Pendel zu 
einer Seite gezogen wird und gehen lassen Sie, sie hin und her 
schwingt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que quand un pendule
est tiré à un côté et laissez vont, elle balancera dans les deux 
sens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que quando um 
pêndulo está puxado para um lado e deixe vão, balançará para a 
frente e para trás.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che quando un 
pendolo è tirato verso un lato e lasci vanno, oscillerà avanti e 
indietro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι όταν τραβιέται 
ένα εκκρεμές σε μια πλευρά και άφησε να πάει, θα ταλαντευθεί 
πέρα δώθε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que cuando un péndulo
se tira a una cara y deje van, hará pivotar hacia adelante y hacia 
atrás.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umfang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">natürliche Frequenz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
